#summary Magic-1 VHDL Port Introduction page

= Introduction =

This project will be the VHDL description of the Magic-1 computer. I will work on this every day (except weekends).

Sample code in M1 assembly language.
{{{
next4:
    ld.16   a,0xabfd
    ld.16   b,0xab00
    cmpb.eq.16	a,b,fail
    ld.8    b,0xfd
    cmpb.ne.16	a,b,fail
    cmpb.eq.16	a,b,next5
    br	fail
}}}
